about_the_game:
Attention: This game is for VR only.

Primitier is a highly flexible VR sandbox game, where you can create tools and machinery by freely cutting and connecting objects in a vast world based on physics simulation.

Official Discord server:

True Craft System

By striking a tree with a stone, the tree is cut at the point of impact. Attach a stone to the end of a cut piece of wood of a suitable length, and you have a stone axe. In this way, you can craft various tools with a realistic sense of craftsmanship, not only with wood and stone but also with almost all objects found within the game.


Expansive World

You can seamlessly traverse a vast, procedurally generated world. As you explore, you may encounter enemies—so be prepared to create weapons to defend yourself.


Advanced Physics Simulation

Including crafted tools, all objects interact through physics simulation. For example, the ease of swinging and destructive power of a stone axe depends on the handle's length and the stone's weight. You can also create machines like carts and airplanes that operate physically.




Simulations of air resistance, lift, and buoyancy are also included.

Avatar Importing

You can change your avatar by loading VRM format files (not all VRM files are supported). The avatar can be hidden if desired.

Posting and Broadcasting Gameplay Videos

We allow the posting and broadcasting of gameplay videos within our guidelines. Please click here for details.
Note that you can output a third-person perspective video on your PC screen using the in-game camera.
